00055         virtual void printDebugInfo(std::ostringstream& ost) const
00056         {
00057             ost<<" Neuron\n";
00058             ost<<"  ownerThread: "<<ownerThread<<std::endl;
00059             ost<<"  activationFunction: "<<activationFunction->getId()<<std::endl;
00060             std::list<Link>::const_iterator it = links.begin();
00061             for(; it != links.end(); ++it)
00062             {
00063                 it->printDebugInfo(ost);

00071         template<class Archive>
00072             void save(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version) const
00073             {
00074                 ar & boost::serialization::base_object<Object>(*this);
00075                 unsigned af_id = activationFunction->getId();
00076                 ar & af_id;
00077                 ar & ownerThread;
00078                 ar & receptiveField;
00079                 ar & activationValue;
00080                 //ar & links; - Net responsibility
00081 
00082                 bool isHintAvailable;
00083                 
00084                 //OpenGL hint
00085                 (oglHint != 0) ? (isHintAvailable = true) : (isHintAvailable = false);
00086                 ar & isHintAvailable;                    
00087                 if(isHintAvailable)
00088                     ar & (*oglHint);
00089                 
00090                 //Learning hint
00091                 (learningHint != 0) ? (isHintAvailable = true) : (isHintAvailable = false);
00092                 ar & isHintAvailable;                    
00093                 if(isHintAvailable)
00094                 {
00095                     LearningHint::HintId lhintId = learningHint->getTypeId();
00096                     ar & lhintId;
00097                     ar & (*learningHint);
00098                 }
00099                 
00100             };
00101 
00102         template<class Archive>
00103             void load(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)
00104             {
00105                 ar & boost::serialization::base_object<Object>(*this);
00106                 unsigned af_id;
00107                 ar & af_id;
00108                 activationFunction = ActivationFunction::getById(af_id);
00109                 ar & ownerThread;
00110                 ar & receptiveField;
00111                 ar & activationValue;
00112                 //ar & links; - Net responsibility
00113 
00114                 bool isHintAvailable;
00115 
00116                 //OpenGL hint
00117                 ar & isHintAvailable;
00118                 if(isHintAvailable)
00119                 {
00120                     oglHint = new OpenGLHint;
00121                     ar & oglHint;
00122                 }
00123 
00124                 //Learning hint
00125                 ar & isHintAvailable;
00126                 if(isHintAvailable)
00127                 {
00128                     LearningHint::HintId lhintId;
00129                     ar & lhintId;
00130                     learningHint = LearningHint::getById(lhintId);
00131                     ar & learningHint;
00132                 }
00133             };
